# Copilot Instructions for STUCCORD Agency Website

- Project: Modern, premium digital agency website for STUCCORD (Next.js + Tailwind CSS)
- Brand: Confident, professional, innovative, future-focused
- Pages: Home, About, Services, Contact
- Features: Responsive, SEO, sticky navbar, smooth scroll, cookie consent, dark/light mode, animated sections, modern typography, conversion-optimized
- Structure: Clean, organized, reusable components
- Deployment: Production-ready, fast, pixel-perfect

## Checklist
- [x] Scaffold Next.js + Tailwind project
- [x] Customize project for STUCCORD agency
- [x] Install required VS Code extensions
- [x] Compile and verify project
- [x] Create and run launch task
- [ ] Ensure documentation is complete

## Guidelines
- Use the current directory as the project root
- Do not add media or external links unless requested
- Use placeholders for assets if needed
- All generated components must serve a clear purpose
- Project is complete when README and this file are up to date
